bitfield.description: Flash patch unit enable bit

bitenum.description: flash patch unit disabled
flash patch unit enabled

bitfield.description: Key field
Number of code slots field.

bitenum.description: no code slots
two code slots
six code slots

bitfield.description: Number of literal slots field.

bitenum.description: no literal slots
two literal slots

bitfield.description: Number of full banks of code comparators, sixteen comparators p
Remap base address field.
Compare and remap enable for Flash Patch Comparator Register 0

bitenum.description: Flash Patch Comparator Register 0 compare and remap disabled
Flash Patch Comparator Register 0 compare and remap enabled

bitfield.description: Comparison address.
This selects what happens when the COMP address is matched

bitenum.description: remap to remap address. See FP_REMAP
set BKPT on lower halfword, upper is unaffected
set BKPT on upper halfword, lower is unaffected
set BKPT on both lower and upper halfwords.
